# HIDDeviceClient.ProvideElementUpdate

**Structure**

A structure that provides values for a list of HID elements.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ProvideElementUpdate
```

## Overview

Provide this structure to [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/updateElements(_:timeout:)] to update the current values for a list of elements. In most cases, this triggers a set report request to the device for all of the reports containing elements in the provided element list.

## Initializers

- **init(values:)**: Creates a [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/ProvideElementUpdate].

## Instance Properties

- **values**: The values used to update the elements.

## Update element values

- **updateElements(_:timeout:)**: Provide new update values for, or request current values from, lists of elements.
- **HIDDeviceClient.RequestElementUpdate**: A request to pull the current value from a list of HID elements
- **HIDDeviceClient.HIDElementUpdateResult**: A class to hold the results of an element update.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- HIDElementUpdate
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
